source_objects.title: Microsoft
source_objects.description: Become proficient in Microsoft tools: Windows, Sharepoint, Excel, Word, Powerpoint, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, Project and more.

items.title: Introduction to Microsoft Excel VBA
items.headline: Learn Microsoft Excel VBA Fundamentals (Excel 2010, 2013, 2016)
objectives_summary: Fundamental Building Blocks of Using Excel VBA to Automate Routine Tasks
How to Implement Excel VBA into an Excel Workbook
Become Familiar with Common Excel VBA Programming Syntax

items.title: Computer Literacy & Basic Computer Skills for Productivity
items.headline: Enhance productivity with this basic computer course: an introduction to computers, Microsoft Windows, & the Apple Mac
objectives_summary: Increase your productivity and professionalism
Acquire solid computer skills
Taught by a university professor

items.title: Excel For Beginners! Top 30 Hottest Tutorials,Tips & Tricks!
items.headline: Learn by doing in small, easy to understand bite sized chunks! Learn VLOOKUP,Macros,Operators,Custom Formats and More!
objectives_summary: You will learn some of the most commonly used Features of Excel at a comfortable pace!
You will learn to Filter, Sort and Organize large sets of Data!
You will build the foundational knowledge needed to become Excel Power Users.

items.title: Learn Excel 2016 Intermediate Level - Beyond the Basics
items.headline: If you already know the basics of Excel, this intermediate level course will help you become an Excel power user
objectives_summary: Review Excel terminology
Learn cool tips and tricks in the Ribbon
Discover common Excel hotkeys

items.title: Use Excel Like A Pro. Fast.
items.headline: Go from spreadsheet rookie to rockstar
objectives_summary: Ability to design and build well structured models from scratch
An understanding of how to use what functions, when
Mastery of time-saving keyboard shortcuts

items.title: Excel: Data cleaning and analysis techniques

visible_instructors.job_title: Corporate Finance Expert, Ex McKinsey, Ex BlackRock
visible_instructors.name: Ashish
visible_instructors.title: Ashish Agarwal

items.headline: Learn Excel functions to do data cleaning, data manipulation and analysis using the TEXT functions
objectives_summary: Complete overview of Microsoft Excel interface
Data analysis in Excel
Data manipulation in Excel

items.title: Microsoft Office Essential Skills
items.headline: Learn the essential Microsoft Office skills employers want from a Microsoft Certified Trainer!
objectives_summary: Confidently use Microsoft Office in the workplace
Understand the essential skills employers expect in Word, Outlook, Excel and PowerPoint
Apply best practices to your work

items.title: Microsoft Excel Pivot Tables - Master Excel Pivot Tables!
items.headline: Excel with Microsoft Excel Pivot Tables & Data Analysis - Excel 2010, Excel 2013, Excel 2016, Excel 2019, Office 365
objectives_summary: Increase your Excel & Pivot Table SKILLS and KNOWLEDGE within 1 HOUR which will GET YOU NOTICED by Top Management & prospective Employers!
Become more PRODUCTIVE at using Excel which will SAVE YOU HOURS per day & ELIMINATE STRESS at work!
We teach you how to use Excel Pivot Tables with CONFIDENCE that will lead to greater opportunities like a HIGHER SALARY and PROMOTIONS!

items.title: Microsoft Access: Complete MS Access Mastery for Beginners

visible_instructors.name: Steve
visible_instructors.job_title: Dedicated Instructor Will Help You Excel | 300K+ Students
visible_instructors.title: Steve McDonald

items.headline: Beginning Microsoft Access mastery. Design Access databases from scratch. For Access 2010, Access 2013, and Access 2016.
objectives_summary: At the end of this course, you will be able to create a simple DATABASE in Access from scratch.
You will know how to create and modify TABLES in Access.
You will know how to create FORMS for enter data into your tables.

items.title: Effective use of OneNote 2013 in real life
items.headline: Improve your note-taking skills and learn how to effectively use Microsoft OneNote 2013 to organize and share your notes
objectives_summary: Take effective notes using OneNote
Organize your notes, ideas and research to get a good overview of your information
Take creative notes from anywhere

items.title: Microsoft 365 Teams - Beginner
items.headline: Get a comprehensive overview of Teams, part of Microsoft 365.
objectives_summary: Converse and collaborate with Teams
Create, add users and manage a team
Add and share files with Teams

items.title: Master Microsoft Outlook - Outlook from Beginner to Advanced

visible_instructors.job_title: Microsoft Certified Trainer - Training Microsoft Since 2000!
visible_instructors.name: Kirt
visible_instructors.title: Kirt Kershaw

items.headline: Learn how Microsoft Outlook can make your life more organized!  (Outlook 2010, 2013, 2016, 2019 & 365)
objectives_summary: Create and send email messages
Create, categorize and organize Contacts
Schedule and organize Events and Appointments

items.title: PowerPoint & Excel Fusion (+250 PowerPoint Slides)

visible_instructors.job_title: Udemy Producer - Filming, Editing & Creative Direction
visible_instructors.name: Richard
visible_instructors.title: Richard Korbut

items.headline: PowerPoint Design & Excel Charts Fundamentals To Create Stunning PowerPoint Presentations That Are Easily Updatable
objectives_summary: Master PowerPoint Design Techniques With A Distinct Focus On The "Packaging"
Impress Your Audience Before You Even Say A Word By Loading Up Stunning Presentations
Use Fundamental PowerPoint Functionalities That Save You Time And Make You Ultra-Efficient (Such As Slide Master, Format Painter, Guides & Gridlines etc)

items.title: MS-900:Microsoft 365& Office 365 Administration Fundamentals

visible_instructors.job_title: Ex-Microsoft ‖ Microsoft Certified Trainer and Architect
visible_instructors.name: Satish Reddy
visible_instructors.display_name: Satish Reddy | Over 30,000 Students | Microsoft Certified Trainer
visible_instructors.title: Satish Reddy | Over 30,000 Students | Microsoft Certified Trainer

items.headline: Learn fundamentals of Microsoft 365 & Office 365 Administration (MS-900 exam) from ex-Microsoft employee.
objectives_summary: Learn Office 365 Administration
Learn configuring Microsoft 365 for your company
Understand basic cloud components

items.title: Microsoft Excel 2016 Training: Beginner to Intermediate
items.headline: The Most Convenient Way to Boost Your Confidence And Learn Microsoft Excel 2016 Inside And Out.
objectives_summary: Discover new and improved features in Excel 2016.
How to effectively use Excel 2016 on a touchscreen device.
How create, save, and open a workbook.

items.title: Master all the MS Excel Macros and the basics of Excel VBA
items.headline: Learn automation of tasks with Excel Macros and Excel VBA With different Excel Projects
objectives_summary: Create plenty of small projects to learn the basics of VBA
Understand VBA programming structure and concepts
Learn the best way to write a VBA code on Excel
